main event: A military pilot instructor observed a metallic disc-shaped object in the air for approximately 7 minutes.
interesting points: The object resembled a sun, flashed during the observation, and changed its position in the sky., The instructor was turning to a student when he first noticed the object., The entire sighting lasted about 7 minutes before the object disappeared., The object's surface was exposed to view during the observation., The report concluded that the sighting was probably a balloon.
